document_data.name: Bloodpurge
document_data.mainbody: '''Bloodpurge''' was an herb that could be found in the deeper parts of polluted freshwater marshes in [[Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Usage: Bloodpurge could be dried and used as an herb to neutralize minor poisons. Bloodpurge that was to be used in this manner cost 15 gold pieces per dose.
